original_text: Now as soon as this letter cometh to you, seeing your master's sons are with you, and there are with you chariots and horses, a fenced city also, and armour;
korean_text: 너희 주의 아들들이 너희와 함께 있고 또 병거와 말과 견고한 성과 무기가 너희에게 있으니 이 편지가 너희에게 이르거든

sentences.original_text: Now as soon as this letter cometh to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 이 편지가 너희에게 도착하는 즉시,

sentences.original_text: seeing your master's sons are with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 주인의 아들들이 너희와 함께 있고,

sentences.original_text: and there are with you chariots and horses,
